headline: Stephens initiates cybersecurity coverage, calls CyberArk best idea
summary: Investing.com -- Stephens initiated coverage of the cybersecurity sector, assigning "Overweight" ratings to CyberArk, Zscaler (NASDAQ:ZS), CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD), and SentinelOne (NYSE:S). The firm named CyberArk its "Best Idea," citing strong positioning in identity security.In periods of macro uncertainty, cybersecurity tends to be viewed as being more resilientStephens highlighted the growing sophistication and volume of cyber threats, which are accelerating due to cloud adoption, remote w

headline: CRWD, GOOG Touted by Pro Investor
summary: CrowdStrike (CRWD) will benefit from the increased need for cybersecurity in the AI era, while Alphabet (GOOG,GOOGL) is getting a lift from its success in AI and its strong ad business, Adam Coons, co-Chief Investment Officer at Winthrop Capital told Schwab Network recently. Coons is bullish on both names. On the macro side, Coons believes […]
